Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 113rd overall pick, by New York (A) in 2010...
Injured on 7/8/2012 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from New York (A) to Colorado on 5/15/2013 (Going to NYA: LF N. Morgan. Going to COL: 2B P. Vasallo)...
Injured on 8/31/2015 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 7 weeks...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/22/2020, off Jerome Williams (LAN)...
Released by Colorado on 4/1/2023...
